title: Bug 15899 - Close All Saved Functionality Inconsistent
description: The 'Close all saved' feature is intermittently failing to function properly.
OB: At times, selecting 'Close all saved' doesn't close the files despite no changes being made.
EB: This feature should reliably close all open files when no changes have been made to them.
SR:
1. Open multiple files.
2. Make no changes to any file.
3. Attempt to use 'Close all saved' feature.
4. Observe the behavior of some files not closing despite meeting the criteria.
